title: One Piece Episode #623 Anime Review
author: Chris Beveridge
description: A detailed review of Episode 623, discussing the farewell scene with the G-5 Marines and the transition from Punk Hazard. The reviewer notes being 'glad to be done with Punk Hazard and to get onto something new' and comments on the pacing of the arc's conclusion.

title: Episode 623 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 623 including plot summary, character appearances, production credits, manga chapter coverage, and trivia. Details the episode's Japanese and English titles, air dates, and TV ratings.

title: Aokiji Saves Smoker! One Piece Episode 622, 623, 624, 625 Reaction!
author: Jamiuwu
description: A YouTube reaction video covering episodes 622-625, including Episode 623's emotional farewell scenes and Law's ultimatum to Doflamingo. The reactor covers the dramatic moments when the alliance departs Punk Hazard.

title: 623-624: "Time for Tearful Goodbyes! Departure from Punk Hazard!" and "G5 Destroyed! Doflamingo's Raid!"
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog post analyzing episodes 623-624, discussing Law's conversation with Doflamingo as a favorite scene that 'ramped up the stakes and reset the peril level to red alert.' Covers the emotional farewell and the setup for the Dressrosa Arc.

title: It's Time to Say Goodbye! Leaving Punk Hazard! - Crunchyroll
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming page for Episode 623 on Crunchyroll, providing legal access to watch the episode with subtitles. Includes episode description and metadata.

title: 623: 'A Regretful Departure - Leaving Punk Hazard!' Discussion
author: Arlong Park Forums Community
description: Community forum discussion thread about Episode 623, featuring fan reactions to the farewell scenes and Law's ultimatum. Includes varied opinions on the pacing and emotional impact of the episode.

title: One Piece Episode 623 Reaction
author: Dre Plays
description: Patreon-exclusive reaction video to Episode 623, featuring real-time reactions to the emotional farewell scenes and Law's strategic ultimatum to Doflamingo.
